examples: Martha wouldn't go into the art museum because, as she put it, "They have obscenities just sitting out, on display!"
Bestiality was outlawed as an obscenity in the strongly conservative community.

definitions.definition: Specifically, an offensive word; a profanity ; a dirty word .
examples: Eliza couldn't stand her daughter's music; as she saw it, it was just shouted obscenities and a heavy drum beat.

definitions.definition: Lewdness , indecency , or offensive behaviour or material.
examples: The coalition of religious conservatives was campaigning against, in their view, rampant obscenity in the entertainment industry.

secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An act of obscene behaviour .
( countable ) Specifically, an offensive word; a profanity ; a dirty word .
( uncountable ) Lewdness , indecency , or offensive behaviour or material.
( uncountable ) The fact of being obscene .
